title: osc.parse
description: The `osc.parse` object in Pure Data is used to parse incoming Open Sound Control (OSC) messages. It extracts the address pattern and arguments from an OSC message, providing output in a format more directly usable for OSC message handling compared to the vanilla `oscparse` object. This object is typically employed for low-level or specialized OSC data parsing, often as part of the `osc.receive` abstraction.
